data.title: Warning
data.content: Panic Button is a useful tool to alert your network quickly when you need help. It can't guarantee your security! Make a plan with your contacts so they are prepared to act fast.

data.title: Setup alert message
data.introduction: This is the message that will be sent with your location.
data.warning: Create a plan so your contacts know what to do when they receive this
data.content:
Security tips

  • Consider creating code words or phrases in your message that only your contacts will understand.
  • You won't have time to change a message in an emergency, so create something that will work in all scenarios.
  • Enable GPS tracking from your phone settings if you want your location to be included with the message.

data.title: Setup Disguise
data.content:
It looks like you weren't successful at opening the app from the Caculate! disguise.

Remember: Hold down any button and you will be asked to enter your pincode.

data.title: Well done
data.content: Congratulations you have now successfully configured the Panic Button app! Make sure you remember how to dismiss the calculator disguise as this is needed to turn alert messages off.

data.title: Setup the Disguise
data.content:
It looks like you weren't successful at opening the app from the calculator disguise.

Remember: The application icon is a calculator when it is disguised.

data.title: Test Disguise
data.introduction: Try now! Open the app by clicking on the Calculate! icon.

data.title: Test Disguise
data.introduction: Well done! Now enter your pincode to access settings.

data.title: Setup Disguise
data.content: Panic Button stays hidden on your phone by looking like a simple calculator. From now on, you will see the calculator disguise whenever you open the app. You need to learn how to dismiss the disguise in order to access your settings and turn the alert messages off.

data.title: Setup contacts
data.introduction: These people will receive the alert.
data.warning: They should know you personally and be able to respond fast.
data.content:
Security Tips

  • Think about who can practically assist you - there is no point someone knowing you are in trouble if they cannot help.
  • Make a plan with your chosen contacts so that they are prepared to act fast.
  • Be aware of the risks - how might your contact be put at risk?

data.title: Create a pincode
data.introduction: This pin code is needed to access the alert settings and to turn the alert messages off. It is not needed to alert contacts in an emergency.
data.warning: Remember your pincode! If you forget it you will need to reinstall the app.

data.title: Well done!
data.content: Your test was successful! In an actual emergency, your alert would have been sent.

data.title: Setup the Alarm
data.content:
It looks like you didn't succeed in triggering the alert using the phone's power button.

Remember: repeatedly press a button on the calculator fast until you feel a vibration.

data.title: Test Hardware Alarm
data.introduction: Try Now! Repeatedly press the power button fast until you feel a vibration.

data.title: Well done!
data.content: Your test was successful! In an actual emergency, your alert would have been sent.

data.title: Setup Alert
data.content:
It looks like you didn't succeed in triggering the alert.

Remember: repeatedly press a button on the calculator fast until you feel a vibration.

data.title: Test Disguised Alarm
data.introduction: Try Now! Repeatedly press a button on the calculator fast until you feel a vibration.

data.title: Setup Alert
data.content: Alternatively, you can trigger the alert directly from the app's disguise screen.

data.title: Setup Alert
data.content:
Now learn how to trigger the Panic Button in an emergency.

Panic Button is unique because you can trigger the alert from the phone's power button. This means you can do it secretly - for example, from inside a jacket pocket.

data.title: Panic Button
data.content: Panic Button is set-up and ready. Click Disguise to exit and hide the application.

data.title: Panic Button
data.content: Panic Button is an Android app that secretly alerts your contacts when you are in trouble. The app stays hidden on your phone by looking like a simple calculator.

data.title: Code
data.fail: If you have forgotten your pin number, uninstall the application from your phone settings and then reinstall it.
